title: Here's Why I Moved to Security Keys for 2FA
description:
I ditched TOTP for security keys on accounts that supported it - here's why, and what they're like for privacy & security! (Kind of a Yubikey Review...sorry Yubico!)

Our TOTP Guide: https://youtu.be/iXSyxm9jmmo
TOTP Problems: https://www.malwarebytes.com/blog/news/2019/01/two-factor-authentication-defeated-spotlight-2fas-latest-challenge
2FA Directory: https://2fa.directory/
Yubikey Catelog: https://www.yubico.com/works-with-yubikey/catalog/?sort=popular

🔐 Website - for all we do: https://techlore.tech
✉️ Privacy Blog - for staying updated: https://dispatch.techlore.tech
🕵 Go Incognito Course - to learn about privacy: https://techlore.tech/goincognito

Connect with the privacy community:
💻 Forum: https://discuss.techlore.tech
Ⓜ️ Mastodon: https://social.lol/@techlore
